list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large, tall machine used for moving heavy objects by suspending them from a projecting arm or beam.
a tall, long-legged, long-necked bird, typically with white or gray plumage and often with tail plumes and patches of bare red skin on the head. Cranes are noted for their elaborate courtship dances.
stretch out one's body or neck in order to see something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she craned forward to look more clearly
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô cran về phía trước để trông rõ ràng hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move (a heavy object) with a crane.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the wheelhouse module is craned into position on the hull
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mô-đun bánh xe được craned vào vị trí trên thân tàu
